name: Oliver, the Fishing Cat
description:
Easy controls, authentic fishing experience.
Wait....something's off!?
This isn't a fishing rod, but...a tail?

The white cat Oliver loves fishing!
Use his tail to swing and catch as many fish as you can within 60 seconds.
Power up your tail with the coins you earn.
The longer your tail, the deeper you can fish.
The more powerful your tail, the bigger fish you can reel in.

There are 6 fishing areas, and 100 types of fish in total.
Try to complete your whole collection!
The legendary monster fish may be found in a lake beyond the gap of time and space!?

Fun content galore!
-Collection:
Collect 100 types of fish.
-Aquarium:
Let the fish you've caught swim. You can earn coins offline too.
-Treasure:
Catch shiny fish, and collect parts from within the stomach. 3 types of treasures exist, and all have special rewards upon completion.
-Character:
There are 7 different characters. Enjoy catching lots of fish with various cats.
-Story:
Enjoy a story full of surprises that Oliver and his friends weave.
